837612427116577313.Text: Ingredients sought by alchemists and apothecaries fall into four broad categories: animal, vegetable, and mineral products, and a fourth category loosely described as exotic. Animal products come from mortal beasts. Vegetable products come from plants. Mineral products come from the earth. Exotic products come from many sources, but are generally of magical or otherworldly origin. When eaten, some ingredients have useful effects; others have bad effects; the scale of effect depends on alchemy skill.
